Kindly Note:

title: 1. The product UIN mentioned in the footer of your policy schedule / Certificate of Insurance along with the product name will guide you to the correct policy wordings
sample_text: to be referred.

title: 3. In case you had opted for add-ons or rider along with your base product, kindly refer to the Prospectus & Policy wording documents of the respective active add-
sample_text: ons/riders available under downloads section on our website
